title: FMG embodies ceramic craftsmanship elevating interiors with maxfine surface tactility
description: with crema avorio, onice platino, and onice rosa, FMG's ceramic surfaces allow architects and designers to create functional and visually stunning environments. The post FMG embodies ceramic craftsmanship elevating interiors with maxfine surface tactility appeared first on designboom | architecture & design magazine.
author: eirini ilia I designboom
excerpt: FMG's maxfine ceramic collections provide a means to elevate interior spaces through a fusion of design, tactility and functionality.

The 2024-launched Crema Avorio, Onice Platino, and Onice Rosa exemplify this approach, presenting surfaces that are as tactile as they are visually unique. FMG LAUNCHES THREE MAXFINE PROJECTS FOR FALL 2024

FMG Fabbrica Marmi e Graniti maintains its commitment to ceramic craftsmanship, technical advancement, and sustainable design, creating surfaces that transcend trends to embody timeless luxury. With the introduction of three MaxFine surface collections – Crema Avorio, Onice Platino, and Onice Rosa – the Italian porcelain stoneware company presents features that cater to a wide range of architectural and interior design projects, layering together both technical and aesthetic qualities. From ivory to onyx hues, and for both large and smaller applications, FMG‘s sophisticated surfaces feature unique patterns of streaks for every environment. 


FMG’s MaxFine surfaces provide a means to elevate interior spaces through a fusion of design and functionality | all images courtesy of FMG Fabbrica Marmi e Graniti

With a longstanding dedication to redefining technical ceramics, FMG Fabbrica Marmi e Graniti has established itself as a leader in the industry, consistently merging nature-inspired beauty with cutting-edge technology. The company‘s design philosophy emphasizes not just covering spaces, but transforming them into interactive environments that engage the senses. The 2024-launched Crema Avorio, Onice Platino, and Onice Rosa exemplify this approach, presenting surfaces that are as tactile as they are visually unique. What sets these projects apart is the attention to detail in their production, from processing techniques to the color palettes and finishes that evoke natural materials while providing the durability and ease of maintenance of ceramics.


each reference embodies the company’s core values of innovation, sustainability, and craftsmanship

Crema Avorio MaxFine’s refined craftsmanship by FMG

Crema Avorio MaxFine redefines elegance through subtlety and refined craftsmanship. Its soft ivory tones bring a warm sophistication to any space, whether in residential, commercial, or hospitality settings. FMG’s production process embeds various grits within the ceramic base, leaving veins exposed to create a natural effect that mimics the look of marble. The result is a surface that not only looks authentic but also feels dense and smooth, offering a tactile experience that enhances the overall feel of the space. Available in five different formats, ranging from 300×150 cm to 75×37.5 cm with a 6 mm thickness, Crema Avorio is versatile enough for large-scale architectural projects as well as more intimate interior applications. Its Natural finish adds to the authentic look, making it a timeless choice that balances luxury with comfort.


with its ivory hue and soft tones, Crema Avorio complements any environment, from private homes to public and commercial spaces


Crema Avorio’s surface is dense and incredibly soft to the touch, offering a unique feel thanks to advanced processing techniques

Onice Platino MaxFine transcends Through Light and Reflection

Inspired by the elegance of onyx, Onice Platino MaxFine stands out for its iridescent reflections and design. The surfaces feature soft veins and translucent hues that give a sense of fluidity and lightness, creating a timeless aesthetic that transcends passing trends. The intricate patterns blend shades of white, beige, and light gray, resulting in a luminous appearance that elevates any space. Onice Platino’s Polished finish further amplifies the play of light across the surface, enhancing its visual depth and highlighting the natural streaks. Available in a range of five formats with a consistent 6 mm thickness, these surfaces are ideal for projects where elegance and sophistication are paramount, from upscale residences to luxurious commercial interiors. Onice Platino’s timeless beauty makes it a perfect choice for designers seeking to create environments that exude an air of refined luxury.
